PARAMETERS_LATEX: P_{{i}}: \text{{price}}, C_{{i}}: \text{{cost}}, Q_{{i}}: \text{{quota}}, A_{{i}}: \text{{activation cost}}, M_{{i}}: \text{{min batch}}, D_{{i}}: \text{{min production days}}, T_{{i}}: \text{{total production limit}}, L_{{i}}: \text{{min production line activation minutes}}
CONSTRAINTS_LATEX: x_{{i}} \leq Q_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; \sum_{{i \in I}} x_{{i}} \leq 1210; x_{{i}} \geq M_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \geq D_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \leq P_{{i}} \cdot x_{{i}} + A_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \geq L_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \leq T_{{i}}, \forall i \in I
